item.title: Natural Language to Database Queries: Text-to-MongoDB
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: graph TD A[Natural Language Interface] --> B{Data Access} B --> C[Non-Technical Users] B --> D[Data Scientists] B --> E[Business Analysts] A --> F{Analytics} F --> G[Real-Time Insights] F --> H[Interactive Exploration] F --> I[Agentic Workflows] A --> J{Data Integration} J --> K[Cross-Database Queries] J --> L[Cross-Domain Analysis] There are a lot of external efforts in creating text2sql LLMs and workflows to facilitate in Retrieval Augmented Generation and agentic workflows.
